title: Self-described 'influencers' Sid and Ash are adamant they have what it takes to win The Amazing Race
text:
They're one of the teams on this year's season of The Amazing Race, and according to Sid and Ash, they have what it takes to go all the way.

In an interview with The Daily Telegraph on Monday, the self-confessed 'influencers' claimed their confidence would take them all the way to the end.

'I have an insane level of self-confidence in the ability to get through any situation regardless of what life throws my way,' Sid, 26, told the newspaper.

Going the distance: They're one of the teams on this year's season of The Amazing Race, and according to Sid and Ash (pictured), they have what it takes to go all the way

'Having built at such a young age a life where I get to call my own shots was always something I strived for from a young age.'

Sid boasts over 13,000 followers on Instagram, while Ash, 30, has over 22,000 followers on her respective Instagram page.

Meanwhile, Ash claimed one of the biggest challenges the couple faced was their mutual stubbornness, which would often lead to arguments.

Win this thing: In an interview with The Daily Telegraph on Monday, the self-confessed 'influencers' claimed their confidence would take them all the way to the end

In a post on Instagram back in August, Sid described Ash as 'the Bonnie to my Clyde'.

'Excited to head off with @pash_ on a social media detox adventure for the next month... Lots happening,' he teased before being announced as a contestant on The Amazing Race.

A trailer for the upcoming season of The Amazing Race was released last Wednesday, with no release date yet given for the show's premiere.

'I have an insane level of self-confidence in the ability to get through any situation regardless of what life throws my way,' Sid told The Daily Telegraph

'This is no vacation. This is The Amazing Race, and anything can happen,' host Beau Ryan, 34, says in the trailer.

The shows features 11 teams, all racing across three continents in a bid to win the $250,000 prize money.

In addition to Sid and Ash, this year's season will feature a pair of nuns, who believe they're in with a good chance given that they have 'the big fella on our side'.
description: They're one of the teams on The Amazing Race, and according to Sid and Ash, they have what it takes to go all the way. The 'influencers' claimed their confidence would take them to the end.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
